# Psychologist Website Project

## Project Overview
This is a React-based website for a psychologist to introduce herself and her services. The website uses static front-end data only (no backend).

## Technology Stack
- React with Vite
- Modern JavaScript/JSX
- CSS for styling
- Static data (no backend)

## Project Structure
- `/src/components` - React components
- `/src/data` - Static data files
- `/src/styles` - CSS stylesheets

## Development Guidelines
- Keep all data static in the front-end
- Use modern React best practices
- Maintain professional, clean design suitable for healthcare
- Focus on accessibility and user experience
